external_references.description: Faou, M., Tartare, M., Dupuy, T. (2019, October). OPERATION GHOST. Retrieved September 23, 2020.

description: For [Operation Ghost](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0023), [APT29](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0016) registered domains for use in C2 including some crafted to appear as existing legitimate domains.(Citation: ESET Dukes October 2019)
